Of justification four disputations clearing and amicably defending the truth against the unnecessary oppositions of divers learned and reverend brethren / by Richard Baxter ... Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
[22], 423 p.
Printed by R.W. for Nevil Simmons ... and are to be sold by him ... and by Nathaniel Elkins ..., London : 1658.
The four disputations have special title pages. Errata on p. [22]. Reproduction of original in British Library.
